about_the_game:
Resume:

A corporation creates a machine capable of traveling between realities in order to save humanity in a future on the brink of imminent extinction of life on Earth.
A tragedy happens when the machine fails, causing 4 distinct realities to merge and the 4 cores of the machine are dispersed among the merged territories.
Amidst the chaos, whoever gathers the 4 cores can successfully restore one reality, causing the others to disappear within a period of 72 hours.

Featuring:

  • Arcade gameplay! No skill tree, all moves and combos unlocked at beging
  • Classical easy to learn, hard to master gameplay
  • Head to the action! No borring and longert texts
  • Original composed soundtracks
  • Play solo or co-op local this nostalgic beat 'em up!
detailed_description:
Resume:

A corporation creates a machine capable of traveling between realities in order to save humanity in a future on the brink of imminent extinction of life on Earth.
A tragedy happens when the machine fails, causing 4 distinct realities to merge and the 4 cores of the machine are dispersed among the merged territories.
Amidst the chaos, whoever gathers the 4 cores can successfully restore one reality, causing the others to disappear within a period of 72 hours.

Featuring:

  • Arcade gameplay! No skill tree, all moves and combos unlocked at beging
  • Classical easy to learn, hard to master gameplay
  • Head to the action! No borring and longert texts
  • Original composed soundtracks
  • Play solo or co-op local this nostalgic beat 'em up!
name: Reality Rash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 29 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 29 GB available space

short_description: Reality Rash is a 3D beat 'em up inspired classics such as Jackie Chan Stuntmaster, Streets of Rage, TMNT... Action which takes place in 4 different worlds each one with unique enemies! Play solo or in 2 player co-op, It’s an nostalgic and modern beat 'em up!
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
